room_title: Escape room "Jester's Revenge" by Memphis Escape Rooms in Memphis
review: This escape room is located at the downtown facility. Free parking is easily found nearby on blocks surrounding the location on South Main. Our group of 7 people have done 5 other escape rooms, and we were in awe of the sheer size of this room - very, VERY spacious and large. It was the largest escape room we've ever done. This particular escape room is perfect for a large group as several people can be performing various puzzles at the same time. Just remember that TEAMWORK is essential to solving this room. The puzzles were wonderfully circus-themed, and really fun to solve. The staff at this location were so wonderfully enthusiastic, paid astute attention to detail, and really made the entire experience so much better. This is easily one of my most favorite rooms to work with a full group.

room_title: Escape room "Jester's Revenge" by Memphis Escape Rooms in Memphis
review: This was so fun. We did it with a little over 10 minutes left. Will so go back. I love it so much. I want to go back already and we just left...

room_title: Escape room "Jester's Revenge" by Memphis Escape Rooms in Memphis
review: This was the most fun I've had in awhile. This is definitely a team builder experience. I will be going soon. The customer service was excellent!

room_title: Escape room "Jester's Revenge" by Memphis Escape Rooms in Memphis
review: Great experience with all of the brother and sister in laws we all would go back in a heart beat! Next time we will get out!

room_title: Escape room "Jester's Revenge" by Memphis Escape Rooms in Memphis
review: Really enjoyed the experience. The puzzles are challenging and fun, and I can't wait to see what they do next. Thanks to the staff for putting up with our (well, my) goofiness and playing along. Great folks working here.

room_title: Escape room "Jester's Revenge" by Memphis Escape Rooms in Memphis
review: We've been on 2 Escape Room adventures and escaped BOTH! Hoping to see more and more rooms added over the coming years; I love the creativity that goes into each clue. Thanks so much to the staff for all that you do and we can't wait to come back for Parallax!!!

room_title: Escape room "Jester's Revenge" by Memphis Escape Rooms in Memphis
review: Some friends and I did the Carnival Asylum and it was sooo much fun!!! We escaped w/ only 3 minutes remaining and we were all so stoked! I haven't had a chance to get out much lately between kids and work and this was the perfect way for me to get out and enjoy myself! Plus it was kinda an early outing for my birthday Monday so what a great way to bring it in! I can't wait to go back and try out another room! I definitely recommend this for anyone that like puzzles, mysteries, or just likes to put their brain power to use!

room_title: Escape room "Jester's Revenge" by Memphis Escape Rooms in Memphis
review: This is an awesome experience everyone should enjoy! I surprise my boyfriend with a trip here for our anniversary and we had a blast. It was a rush trying to figure everything out. We went to the Halloween themed room Carnival Asylum. We worked with 8 other people, which you'd think would be a bit much seeing as we didn't know any of them, but wasn't at all. We got to work with a group of people who all think differently and help each other out. It was a good way to meet new people and just have a really good time. I think this place is going to do very well in Memphis. The staff is great and very informative. It is something different to do and it is an amazing experience. I would recommend this place to everyone.
